title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4606.5 - Disapproval procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4606.5 - Disapproval procedure

State Regulations

If the application is not approved, the licensing
authority where the premises are located shall give due notice to the
applicant, in writing, of a hearing to be held upon the qualifications of the
applicant and the merits of the application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4606.5

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
